name: IMDB URL search & capture
description: A pattern to search for IMDB urls from f.ex. NFO files.  They can be of different forms, such as:http://us.imdb.com/Title?1234567http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1234567/http://akas.imdb.com/title/tt1234567/www.imdb.com/title/tt1234567/The pattern has one capture group for the 7 digit IMDB number.
author: AllOutNow
